page.title: 15Recreation(2)
page.content: {THE CALDERDALE WAY}was established in 1974 to link public footpaths and walks to make a long hike all the way around the Calderdale border,passing through places such as Ripponden, Todmorden,Greetland and Brighouse.The Calderdale Way is 55 miles long.Since it was officially opened many organisations have benefited from the wildlife and plantlife which is varied in this area.Many tourists walk part of the Way but only experienced hikers do the whole walk. {THE SHAY}has three main facilites,a football team,a speedway team and a club where anyone can go and play football with the team.The star of the speedway team is Kenny Carter,one of the best riders in the world.The club also runs a bar with a disco and a restaurant.
